snippet.title: "The Sisterhood Mansion" - First Official Trailer
snippet.description:
『The Sisterhood Mansion』 is a pixel-style, light fantasy simulation game infused with cultural elements from China’s southwestern minorities. In this mysterious village nestled among mountains, you’ll take on the role of the mansion’s heir, learning to cultivate and graft plants, raise animals, fish, develop signature dishes, and build up the lodge’s economy. But as you dive into this fulfilling and bustling life, you’ll also begin to uncover the mythical world that the villagers speak of…
The Steam store page is out now! Welcome to view more information~Thank you for your support as a wishlist!

#indiegame #gaming #steam #lifesimulation #simulation
